heisigStory: The pictograph for the ear looks much like that for eye, but note how the stroke order gives it a different look.
koohiiStory1: Your ear is like the eye on the side of your head for seeing things, but there is hair around it that creates jagged lines.
koohiiStory2: Pictograph, see book. * The primitive meaning can easily be extended to ear plugs.
words:
耳鼻科(じびか): otolaryngology
初耳(はつみみ): something heard for the first time
耳(みみ): ear
